main-header: Give the gift of great food to your friends or teams at work
main-paragraph: We listened to your requests and launched elmenus GiftMeals, a simple way for you to share promos with friends or teams at work so everyone can enjoy great food wherever they are.
second-header: Bring Happiness To Your Team or to your Friends
setGiftText: Set your budget for each GiftMeal (e.g. 10 EGP) and select how many GiftMeals you would like to buy.
listFriendsText: Set your budget for each GiftMeal (e.g. 10 EGP) and select how many GiftMeals you would like to buy.
payText: Once you purchase the GiftMeals, you'll receive a confirmation email and your friends/teams will receive an SMS with the GiftMeal promo code.
theyReceiveText: The people you gifted can use their personalized GiftMeal promo code via their associated phone number to order great dishes on elmenus.
subTitle: Sub-title
hm-main-header: Discover & Order the food you love.
hm-send-food: Send great food to your friends or teams at work
hm-Get food delivered: Get food delivered from amazing restaurants around you
hm-Browse restaurants by: Browse restaurants by mood, cuisine, area or dish names
hm-Want to know your order status: Want to know your order status? No problem, Now you can know exactly where your order is throughout the delivery process.
hm-Order your favorite food: hm-Order your favorite food easier, faster, and without phone calls.
hm-Look for restaurants that have this s: Look for restaurants that have this sign
orderOnline: Online ordering only unavailable in St. Mohamed Tawfik right now
